summary: THE DOMETIC RM7732 REFRIGERATOR IN MY RV FAILED AND THE AMMONIA LEAKED OUT WHILE THE VEHICLE WAS OCCUPIED.  WE QUICKLY EVACUATED THE VEHICLE BEFORE WE WERE OVERCOME BY THE FUMES. FORTUNATELY WE WERE NOT RUNNING THE UNIT ON GAS OR THERE WOULD HAVE BEEN A FIRE.  THIS IS A VERY DANGEROUS UNIT AND SHOULD BE RECALLED.  *TR

TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 1999 NATIONAL TROPI-CAL.  THE VEHICLE HAS A DOMETIC REFRIGERATOR, MODEL RM7732 (NA).  THE REFRIGERATOR FAILED TO KEEP THE FOOD COLD, BUT WAS REPAIRED.  THE REFRIGERATOR WAS NOT INCLUDED IN THE RECALL REGARDING THE EQUIPMENT BECAUSE IT IS A DOUBLE DOOR MODEL.   THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 43,000 AND FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 42,000.       UPDATED 5/19/08 *CN  THE CONSUMER WAS TOLD HIS MODEL NUMBER WAS NOT INCLUDED IN THE RECALL. UPDATED. 05/19/08. *JB
